metadata.name: Life of Vice
metadata.description: Life of Vice is the story of overwhelmed reporter Shelby Ambrose's experience covering the debauched Las Vegas antics of rock star Becky Vice. Over a ridiculous weekend the pair will get into trouble at casinos, adult entertainment awards, and pro-wrestling matches; but most of all they will become friends. A spin-off event from Robin Enrico's previous book Jam In The Band.
